title: iOS Interview Preparation

subModules.title: Swift Programming Language
Fundamental Swift Concepts
subModules.description: Covers basic Swift language constructs and types, essential for building a solid programming foundation.

subModules.title: Intermediate Swift Concepts
subModules.description: Explores intermediate Swift features such as protocols, memory management, and error handling, crucial for app development.

subModules.title: Advanced Swift Features
subModules.description: Delves into advanced Swift language features, enabling high-performance, modular code for large-scale applications.
Comprehensive insights into the Swift programming language, covering foundational to advanced concepts critical for iOS development.

subModules.title: Software Architecture and Design Patterns
SOLID Principles
subModules.description: Explains the SOLID principles and their application in iOS development for improved code modularity, maintainability, and scalability.

subModules.title: Model-View-ViewModel (MVVM) Architecture
subModules.description: An exploration of MVVM architecture, commonly used for complex iOS apps, especially with SwiftUI.
A deep dive into essential software architectures and design patterns used in iOS for scalable and maintainable applications.

description: An extensive overview of essential iOS development knowledge, designed to prepare you thoroughly for iOS interview success.
